title: CBC Radio
text:
Natalie Closner Schepman, Meegan Closner and Allison Closner are three sisters who — like any group of siblings — have found themselves at odds before.

The trio from Portland, Ore. perform together as Joseph, so it's understandable that sisterly scuffles can become magnified when you're spending nearly all your time together, making music and touring as a band.

Joseph dropped by the q studio to talk to host Tom Power about the one fight that nearly tore the band apart and how they figured it out. They also performed a few songs from their new album, Good Luck, Kid, which is out now.

Download our podcast or click the 'Listen' link near the top of this page to hear the full conversation with Joseph.

— Produced by ​Emma Godmere
description: Natalie Closner Schepman, Meegan Closner and Allison Closner of the band Joseph dropped by the q studio to perform a few songs from their new album, Good Luck, Kid.
